author: vorot93
content: On a side note, have you considered deploying turbogeth?

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Yes!  It's on my roadmap to try out for sure, but we've been pretty busy with other stuff and so keep using the "alpha" status as an excuse to prioritize other work. ðŸ™‚  I really want to try out the rpc daemon for obvious reasons.

author: chaserxy
content: I'm thinking on the order of 1-2 weeks. if both SSD types finish under that, I'm fine with both.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: It's been awhile since I've last synced geth as an archive node from genesis, probably sometime in early 2020,  so perhaps things have gotten better due to optimizations (or worse due to the size increasing) but at that time even on NVMe drives it took ~30 days.
